snap(25,-10,-50)

sky(101,51,1)
fog(80,40,1)
ground(111,56,2)
polys(128,65,2)

fadefrom(6000)
density(3)

name(Digger's Badlands)
nlaps(3)


set(47,0,0,0)p
set(14,0,4500,-90)pt
set(12,-4500,6000,-120)p
chk(40,-10100,7500,90)
set(32,-10100,7500,90)
set(10,-10100,7500,90)p
set(12,-15700,9000,-120)p

set(10,-21300,10500,90)p

set(33,-18500,1500,90)
set(15,-15700,1500,90)p
set(33,-12900,1500,90)
set(15,-10100,1500,90)p
set(17,-5600,1500,-90)pt

set(17,-5600,-2000,180)pt
set(15,-10100,-2000,90)p
set(33,-12900,-2000,90)
set(15,-15700,-2000,90)p
set(17,-20200,-2000,90)pt
chk(42,-20200,-1000,0)
set(15,-20200,2500,0)p
set(34,-20200,5300,0)pr

set(20,-20200,17500,0)p
set(10,-20200,23100,0)p
set(37,-20200,25500,0)
set(38,-20200,25500,0)

set(10,-20200,28700,0)p

set(12,-27300,15400,-30)p

set(10,-21300,25500,90)p

set(12,-15700,24000,-120)p
set(20,-10100,22500,90)p
set(33,-7300,22500,90)
set(15,-4500,22500,90)p

set(17,0,22500,180)pt
set(15,0,27000,0)p
set(15,0,32600,0)p
set(35,0,35400,0)pr

set(24,0,40200,0)po
set(17,0,42300,0)pt
chk(42,1750,42300,90)
set(17,3500,42300,-90)pt
set(44,3500,37800,0)p
set(43,3500,32200,0)p

maxb(8,-7500,-29000)
